name: UrlBuilder_joinStreamUrlsTest
description: Unit tests for the joinStreamUrls method in the UrlBuilder class.

test_cases.name: testJoinStreamUrlsWithValidStreams
test_cases.description: Tests the joinStreamUrls method with a list of valid streams.

test_cases.name: testJoinStreamUrlsWithEmptyStreams
test_cases.description: Tests the joinStreamUrls method with an empty list of streams.

test_cases.name: testJoinStreamUrlsWithNullStreams
test_cases.description: Tests the joinStreamUrls method with a null list of streams.
